message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $11,500. I believe it holds significant value that could benefit you greatly.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $11,100?  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to consider $10,900? I think this is a more reasonable price for the product.
